name: artf-building-system
description: ARTF Building Management System with MySQL, File Upload, and WebSockets

scripts.docker:build: sh -c 'if command -v docker-compose >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker-compose build; else docker compose build; fi'
scripts.docker:up: sh -c 'if command -v docker-compose >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker-compose up -d; else docker compose up -d; fi'
scripts.docker:down: sh -c 'if command -v docker-compose >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker-compose down; else docker compose down; fi'
